title: Interpretation of a dream about a tooth in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a molar in a dream by Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi Sometimes we wake up from a dream and feel that there is a certain sign on it, or we are afraid of the unclear meaning and search for the meaning of the interpretation of what we have. You may also be able to recognize entering the house of the dead in a dream. The appearance of a molar or seeing it in a dream is a sign. Certain, but it varies depending on the viewer, so today we open the books on the interpretation of the sign of Sheikh Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi to understand more. Follow us. Read also: Backgrounds in a dream. Interpretation of a molar in a dream by Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi. Interpretation scholars differed in interpreting certain issues and each of them had a special opinion. Today we learn about the interpretation Ibn Sirin for a dream in which a person sees a molar or tooth falling out. Al-Nabulsi said that the falling of a molar or tooth in general is a sign of longevity. And if the dream is that all of his teeth have fallen out, then this is a sign of the death of the parents before the fortuneteller. The vision in which the molar is in the palm of the hand A sign of the abundance of money, and its falling to the ground is a sign of death. Whereas if it falls on the dreamer’s stone, it is a sign of nourishment for children. As Ibn Sirin mentioned that lower jaw teeth and molars that fall in a dream are not a good sign. Read also: Talking to The dead in a dream. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of the loss of a molar and a tooth in a dream. Learn about Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation through the following lines: Al-Nabulsi narrated that if the dreamer drops his teeth in a dream and finds them, then this is an indication of his long life. Whereas, if they are not found, it is a sign of illness or the loss of a person in His life. He agreed with Ibn Sirin that the loss of teeth in the lower jaw is a sign of worry and sadness. Anyone who cannot continue eating after teeth fall out in a dream is a sign of poverty. Ibn Shaheen also said: The loss of teeth is evidence of a woman’s dominance over Man. While a person sees himself in a dream brushing his teeth with an axe, this indicates the presence of disagreements between family members. Read also: I saw my husband getting married. What is the interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman’s pierced tooth? Jurists have stated that the interpretation of visions may differ according to the gender and status of the monarch, The interpretation for a pregnant woman varies, and it is as follows: Seeing a perforated molar in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the problems and difficulties that she will face. It also indicates the woman’s fear and anxiety about many things in her life. While the pregnant woman saw a new molar in her dream, this indicates the nutrition and quality that she will face. In her life. This tooth also indicates that the next child is a male. He is free of disease and in good health, God willing. Read also: Entering the police academy in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about a pierced tooth for a divorced woman? A dream about a pierced tooth affects the dreamer himself, and he fears that it is a sign of something bad And we will explain to you his interpretation for a divorced woman as follows: This dream for a divorced woman is a sign of problems and anxiety. And when she dreams that she is cleaning her molars, this is a sign that she will overcome difficulties and challenges. But she must purify her soul and stay away from things that anger God Almighty. Interpretation of molecular extraction

title: Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of seeing a male child in a dream, as reported by various dream interpretation scholars. The world of dreams is full of secrets and mysteries that some cannot interpret without consulting a lawyer, or referring to a book by dream scholars. Although sometimes it is just a tube that has no meaning or purpose, in a group of other cases it is a strong message about something or a sign of a certain event and perhaps a warning or good news about something. So if you are looking for an interpretation of seeing a male child in a dream, all you have to do is follow the lines below in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of seeing a child in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a child in a dream by Ibn SirinThe famous dream scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a male child in a dream is a sign of friendship, but he sometimes sees that it brings evil with it, and this position depends on the viewer himself. As for if he is rich and prosperous, seeing a boy in this case is a sign of worry and anxiety that afflicts the fortune teller, God forbid. Whoever finds a male child in his dream, this dream does not bode well, as it indicates the emergence of problems or the discovery of a friend’s betrayal or the passage of serious difficulties in life. And if the dreamer finds a sick child in his dream, this is a sign of the presence of a group of people around the dreamer who are approaching him as his loved ones, although they harm him. Ibn Sirin added that seeing a male child in a dream has a different interpretation according to his age, as the infant is a sign of the coming of worries and anxiety, while the teenage child is a sign of his departure, God willing. Interpretation of a dream of a male child in the dream of an unmarried woman Seeing a male child in a single dream does not always mean that it is bad, although It is often a sign of anxiety and fears, but if this child has a beautiful appearance and plays and smiles freely in a dream, this is an indication that he will succeed in her life and overcome the difficulties she faces. Perhaps this dream is good news for her that she will get married soon. Interpretation of seeing a male child in a dream for a married woman Seeing a male child in a dream for a married woman, if there is no illness or harm, is a sign of the great good that she will achieve in her life. And if he suffers from worries and anxiety, seeing a male child in a dream is evidence that he will be released soon, God willing. Dreaming of a married woman giving birth to a male child does not bode well, it is a warning of the worries and anxiety that she will be afflicted with in the future, God forbid. Interpretation of seeing a male child in a dream for a pregnant woman A male child in a pregnant woman's dream is evidence of the goodness and blessing that God will give her in the near future. In some cases, this is a sign that her due date is approaching. But if a woman sees in her dream an ugly or sick child, this dream does not bode well, and the woman should be careful about it. Seeing a male child in a dream can be a sign that he will be born in reality, with the same qualities that he saw. Interpretation of seeing a male child in a dream for a man If a man finds a child in a dream, this is a sign of some fears and worries that he will face in the future.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a fat person and its meaning

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing an obese person and its meaning: There may be many people who suffer from obesity and are overweight, as they may resort to a system that helps them lose weight. It is worth noting that obesity is one of the most dangerous diseases that exist around the world, due to the many other diseases that it causes. For people, obesity can affect movement and activity and make the person inactive and unable to do the simplest things. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a fat person and its meaningObesity is a common disease in our time, due to the presence of many fast foods and meals that contain large amounts of calories, and seeing the person Obese people can indicate these signs: This vision is considered by a human being to bring happiness and goodness to the dreamer in the coming days. Also, seeing him in a man’s dream may mean that he will get a project from which he will earn a lot of money. Seeing a fat woman in a dream is one of the signs of goodness. In her coming years. When a fat person seems to become thinner, it may be a sign of many problems in his life. A tall person who can become fat in a dream indicates that there is deception and deceit in his life. These many interpretations vary depending on the details of the dreamer’s dream, And the conditions in which he lives, and this is what the interpreters have interpreted. See also: Interpretation of dreams of a sick dead person dying in a dream in detail from the most famous interpretation scholars. Seeing a fat dead person in a dream. There may be many people who we may see in our dreams who have died, and because of our great love for them, we may see them often. And the interpretation of a dream about a fat dead manYou can come up with the following people: It can be considered one of the signs of the status and position that the deceased will acquire in a good outcome. In the event that the deceased becomes obese through the food that the fortuneteller gave him, this indicates the benefits that he will obtain. But if The deceased is fat but suffering from hunger, this indicates that the dreamer will suffer from many problems. In general, obesity in a man’s dream indicates that it is a sign of wealth and wealth for the dreamer. I dream that a fat man overcomes me in a dream. Obesity is the main cause of many serious diseases that can That the viewer suffers from it, and this is worth mentioning. A dream about a fat man hitting me can indicate many indicators, the most important of which are: If obesity appears in general, it is considered a sign of blessing and livelihood. It is also one of the signs that he will get a job very soon. It is worth Noting that obesity is a promising dream for those who dream of a lot of happiness and kindness. While a fat person hits the fortuneteller in a dream, this can be considered a sign that he will face some problems. See also: A detailed interpretation of a dream about a sick person recovering in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my fat son. There are many young children who They suffer from obesity and overweight as a result of their unhealthy diet and this can cause them serious diseases. I dream of my fat son. It is said that it is interpreted through the following interpretations: It can

title: Interpretation of a dream about preparing a travel bag

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about preparing a travel bag in a dream, via the website roy2a.com. Preparing a travel bag indicates radical and positive changes in a person’s life, and it may indicate the marriage of a girl and moving to a new home in married life or a prestigious job for a young man, and we will explain that in detail in this article. For a married, pregnant or divorced woman, interpretations are provided by great commentators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq or modern-day commentators. Follow us on the Vision website. Interpretation of a dream about preparing a suitcase in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: The traveler sees that he is leaving his family and relatives and bidding farewell to his family. It indicates Radical and positive changes in the dreamer’s life and changing his life for the better. Seeing in a dream that you are packing a suitcase for a poor man indicates the creation of wealth and wealth. Seeing a suitcase in a dream indicates job promotion. Seeing travel in a dream indicates a change in the situation for the better and obtaining a job with a rewarding salary. See Also: Interpretation of seeing a passport in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a dream A travel bag being prepared for a single woman: Seeing a travel bag being prepared in a dream for a single woman It indicates radical changes that will occur in her life when she obtains a university degree or doctorate. If a girl sees that she wants to travel, it is an indication that she feels lonely Isolation and psychological disorder. Seeing in a dream preparing for a trip for an engaged girl indicates the approaching date of her wedding. See also: Interpretation of seeing honor in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a woman packing a travel bag in a dream: If a married woman sees a travel bag, this indicates good luck and that her husband will join a prestigious job or promotion. Seeing preparation A suitcase in a dream for a married woman. It indicates the changes taking place in her life and the collapse of marital problems and disputes. If a married woman sees that she is packing a suitcase, it indicates moving to a new residence. See also: Interpretation of seeing money in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about preparing a suitcase for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees That she is carrying a travel bag indicates the approaching date of birth. If a pregnant woman sees that she is traveling, it indicates the ease of childbirth and the happiness of the newborn. See also: Interpretation of a dream about preparing a table What is the interpretation of a dream about preparing a travel bag for a divorced woman: Seeing preparations for travel in a divorced woman’s dream indicates the death of sadness and anxiety and a change in her life for the better If a divorced woman sees that she is carrying a travel bag, it indicates her marriage again or her return to her ex-husband. Seeing preparing to travel in a divorced woman’s dream indicates a promotion at work, obtaining a prestigious position, or moving to a new residence. See also: Interpretation of seeing a suitcase or suitcase in a dream. Interpretation Arranging a bag in a dream: Checking a set of travel bags expresses feelings of loneliness and isolation as a result of difficult experiences. Seeing ourselves moving and traveling in a dream announces the dissolution of an unmarried girl’s engagement. Checking a travel bag indicates a search for comfort and tranquility. What is the interpretation of a dream about preparing for a trip in a dream: See preparations Traveling for a bachelor's degree indicates repentance and a return to God, because it indicates serious work or marriage

title: Interpretation of fish in a dream in detail for a single woman

preview.html: The interpretation of fish in a dream for an unmarried woman often indicates good and good news in life. Aside from being one of the most beautiful foods that everyone loves and accepts, it is one of the symbols that indicate goodness and abundant nutrition in reality. Certainly, the interpretation of the dream varies depending on the situation in which the dreamer actually finds himself. Through this encyclopedia article, we will mention the single girl specifically, so stay tuned. Interpretation of fish in a dream in detail for a single woman. Interpretation of fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The famous dream interpretation scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing fish in a dream in general can be a sign of a woman in Reality. Ibn Sirin also mentioned that a fish is a provision from God that He sends to whomever He wishes, and seeing it in a dream is certainly a sign of goodness and abundance that the dreamer will receive in reality. He added that the decorative fish found in homes is evidence of the dreamer’s luck, while fishing is good news for her marriage and livelihood. Of the righteous heir, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing, and perhaps it will be so. Evidence of her ability to achieve what she wants in the world and achieve many successes. Raw fish does not bode well, it warns the dreamer that there is a group of enemies lurking around her. Seeing isolated people trying to fish and not being able to catch a single fish, does not mean failure to fulfill desires and not The ability to achieve goals, God forbid. Perhaps it is a warning message informing her not to waste time in a way that does not benefit her. Interpretation of a fish in a dream by Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation agrees with Ibn Sirin, as he saw that a fish in a dream indicates the goodness and happiness that the dreamer will obtain. He added that grilled fish in particular is evidence of the fortune teller's ability to defeat enemies. As for buying fish in a dream, it promises an unmarried woman that her wedding date is approaching. However, a dead fish does not bode well at all, as it is a sign of the harm that the viewer will be exposed to next time, God forbid. And if an unmarried woman sees that she is eating cooked fish in a dream, then her dream is a sign of the abundance of money that she will earn soon. Interpretation of a dream Fishing in a dream Fishing in a dream is interpreted for single people in two ways, the first is a sign of kindness and abundant nourishment that the dreamer will receive in his life, if the fish has a beautiful appearance and is fresh. It also indicates the abundance of money that the dreamer will obtain without any expectations from him, whether through inheritance or a prestigious job. The other side of this vision is catching dead fish, which does not bode well at all, as it is evidence of the failure of the visionary to achieve what he wants in life. This world and her inability to achieve her goals. Interpretation of buying fish in a dream for a single womanDream interpretation scholars unanimously agree that buying fish in a dream for a single girl is a sign of happiness and great joy in her life. It will also be good news for her about the great success she will achieve, practically or socially, in her life with her husband

title: Interpretation of seeing a hijab in a dream by Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the hijab in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Seeing the hijab in a dream indicates many events in the dreamer’s life, and the hijab indicates good luck and good news, and the colored hijab indicates the approaching marriage as she grows up, as we know well, and girls of different ages wear it and it is obligatory for every Muslim woman. There are other uses for the hijab, as it is placed on clothes in the neck area to give an elegant aesthetic appearance. Colors of the hijab: Seeing the hijab indicates purity, chastity, religiosity, and marriage to a girl. Follow us to learn about Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of seeing the hijab in a dream. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of seeing a girl wearing the hijab in a dream indicates the good work that the girl is doing. title: Learn about the interpretation of someone calling a dead person in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of a dream about a dead person calling a living person by his name

preview.html: Who called a dead person in a dream, is seeing a conversation with the dead good or bad? What are the negative connotations of a dream about talking to the dead? What does talking to the dead on the phone in a dream symbolize? Read this article and learn about the interpretation of seeing talking with a dead person according to Ibn Sirin and the leading interpretation scholars. Who called a dead person in a dream? Commentators said that talking to a dead person in a dream indicates the blessed status of the dead person in God and his happiness after his death, and if the dreamer sees the dead person talking to him And he asks him for food, as this indicates his blessed status. Need for begging and alms.If the dreamer sees the dead person talking to him and telling him that he will die soon, then the vision foretells the imminence of his life and the Lord (Glory be to Him) is the only one who knows the ages. Work. It is said that dreaming of talking to a deceased person for a long time indicates that the dreamer’s life will be long and that his health condition will improve soon and he will get rid of the health problem that he was facing in the previous period. A supplication for mercy and forgiveness. Interpretation of a dead person in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted talking with a dead person in a dream as evidence that this dead person was a good man in his life, and helped the poor and needy because the Lord granted him many blessings after his death. He faces a serious health problem that may lead to his death. Talking to the dead without seeing them in a dream is a sign of serious crises that the dreamer will soon face. He will earn it soon through legal means. Ibn Sirin said that seeing the deceased talking to the dreamer while he is sleeping next to him in bed, this means that he will immigrate abroad soon to work or study and will face some problems at first, but in the end you will gain many benefits. And suits. This specialized online dream interpretation site features a selection of the best dream and vision interpreters in the Arab world. To access it, type Dream Interpretation Website on Google. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person calling the living by his name by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dead person calling the living by his name as evidence that he is a righteous person who approaches the Lord (Almighty) through fasting, prayer, and good deeds. He says it sincerely in a dream. If the dreamer sees the dead person calling him and giving him something, this indicates the abundant goodness that he will soon gain in his life. Happiness belongs to a member of the deceased’s family. The most important interpretations of sayings of the dead in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of the dead person calling the living by his name. Scientists interpret the vision of the dead person calling the living by his name as evidence. On the Lord’s satisfaction with him. Hearing the voice of the dead in a dream. Commentators said that hearing the voice of the dead in a dream indicates the fulfillment of wishes and an answer to prayers, that the dreamer has been asking God Almighty for a long time. He does not get into major problems. Talks from the dead to the living in a dream. Some interpreters said that the dead person’s sayings to the living indicate that his life is long and that he is in complete health and well-being, and if the dead person speaks to the monarch and tells him that he is not dead, then... It means that he will enjoy comfort and happiness in the afterlife, and the obstacles he faces in his work. title: Interpretation of seeing pasta in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing pasta in a dream through the website Vision roy2a.com. Pasta is considered one of the most famous sweets in the Arab countries and is abundant in the month of Ramadan, where it is distributed as charitable donations in mosques. Today, through this article, we will give you a gift. Interpretation of seeing pasta in a dream, according to the great interpreters, Like Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other scholars of dream interpretation, according to the status of the dreamer, whether he is male, single, or married, follow us.Interpretation of seeing pasta in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirininterpretation of seeing pasta in a dream, which indicates that God will bless the dreamer with a lot of goodness, blessings, and blessings in His life. Eating pasta in a dream. This indicates that the dreamer will have great wealth in the future, and God knows best. Pasta in a dream indicates keeping the dreamer away from all his worries and anxieties in his life. Seeing pasta in a dream can indicate the pursuit of insight in his practical life in order to achieve his dreams and aspirations. Pasta in a dream indicates the appearance of promising things in the dreamer’s personal and professional life. Eating pasta and feeling happy in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be cured of any illness or disease in his body, God willing. Interpretation of seeing pasta in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of seeing pasta in a dream indicates great effort. Which God expends in his work for the sake of promotion. Seeing delicious pasta in a dream indicates that the dreamer will hear good news about his life in the coming days, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing pasta in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi interprets seeing pasta in a dream and indicates that the fortuneteller will soon reach a good position in his professional life, and God I know. Seeing pasta in a dream also indicates many happy events in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of seeing pasta in a dream for a single woman. Seeing pasta in a dream says that a young man with good morals and a good heart is proposing to her, and God knows best. Pasta in a dream for a single woman indicates that she will marry a man in Extreme beauty and morals, and God knows best. Buying pasta in a dream for a single woman indicates that she will soon marry a person who has many good qualities and is well off. Interpretation of seeing pasta in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman making pasta in a dream indicates that he will live a married life full of stability, happiness, and satisfaction. Eating pasta in a dream for a married woman: It indicates that her husband is a generous person and does everything in his power to make his wife and children live a happy life. Interpretation of seeing pasta in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing pasta for a pregnant woman in a dream announces that she will give birth to a baby girl, and God knows best. Pasta in a dream for a pregnant woman shows that she will undergo a birth operation Easy and accessible, and you will not suffer from fatigue or pain. Interpretation of seeing pasta in a dream for a divorced woman. Ibn Sirin explained that he saw pasta in a dream from a divorced woman. She declares that God will compensate her with a good man whom she will marry and live a happy life with, but he is many years older than her.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing vomiting in a dream in its entirety?

preview.html: The Trend website provides you with a complete explanation of vomiting in a dream. It is known for vomiting, regurgitation, or vomiting during sleep because it goes through our lives that we feel sick constantly. We have also collected for you, our dear followers, the complete symbol of vomiting in a dream, as well as vomiting in a complete dream for children and adults. Why does Ibn Sirin dream that he is vomiting? Ibn Sirin indicated that seeing vomiting in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s return to his Lord and evidence of his repentance and guidance. Also, seeing vomiting in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s return to his Lord and evidence of his repentance and guidance. Vomiting in a dream completely and nothing coming out of the mouth is one of the unwanted dreams that indicate a chronic illness. Not being able to return in the dream indicates the dreamer’s difficulty in making important decisions in his life. Wrapping honey in a dream is full of visions that indicate the dreamer’s righteousness in His religion and one who memorizes the Holy Qur’an. Vomiting milk in a dream indicates feelings of fear and tension that affect the dreamer during the current period of his life. Dreaming of a symbol of vomiting. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing the return of alcohol in a dream is complete evidence that the dreamer will get rid of forbidden money. Vomiting in a dream indicates kindness. And repentance for sins and the dreamer’s release from the state of failure that he is experiencing. In addition, returning something that is not loved in a dream completely indicates that the dreamer will steal something that is not his right. Sleeping vomiting for a poor womanWhy dream of a lonely woman vomiting is evidence of goodness, happiness, and hearing good news. Why does a single woman dream that she vomits in a complete dream, and it was white in color and tasteless, which indicates that God will give her a wealthy husband. Light vomiting in the complete dream of an unmarried woman indicates her innocence of her sins, her sincere repentance, and her return to God. Why does a married woman dream of vomiting in a complete dream? With vomiting? Scrolling in a dream for a married woman is completed with visions indicating that she will get rid of some bad and forbidden things in her life. Vomiting and fainting in a complete dream for a married woman testify to her happiness and stability in married life and the fulfillment of her desires. A woman’s attempt to vomit in a dream is evidence of her desire to Preserving her home and family. The complete return of a pregnant woman in a dream. The interpretation of a pregnant woman who sees herself completely vomiting in a dream indicates that God will grant her a healthy child free from all diseases. Also, seeing a woman vomiting water in a dream means that she will undergo an easy, economical, and trouble-free birth process. Seeing honey in a pregnant woman’s dream is one of the dreams that indicates that God will give her a male son. Vomiting in a child’s dream. The interpretation of seeing vomiting in a child’s completed dream is one of the visions that attest to good health and recovery from illness. Also, seeing a child vomiting in a dream indicates his success and achievement. In life and his interest in learning.If you have a dream and want it interpreted, leave it in a comment below and a team of experts will answer you soon.

title: Interpretation of seeing nail polish in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing manicure nail polish in a dreamWe present to you on the Mohazat website what is new and distinctive in this article on our website, interpretation of dreams, dream interpretation, interpretation of seeing nail polish, interpretation of seeing manicure in a dream, and the meaning of seeing a young man on the Mohazat website. You can see: Interpretation of seeing Engagement in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a manicure in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Because there was a manicure or nail polish in the time of Ibn Sirin, so he did not say anything about it. But he talked about the dye, and here we will quote what contemporaries and other Westerners said about the interpretation of this vision and its purpose: Nail polish is one of the things of joy and happiness and it will be It is nice to see it. It is good news, and it is good for the dreamer, but if the dreamer sees that his nails have become ugly and disgusting, this is bad and misfortunes. Seeing a boy or girl for this vision means health and good condition if the color of the paint is red. And if the dreamer sees himself Happy in his dream, this indicates happiness and good condition, even if he was sick, he was cured and his condition improved. Seeing the dreamer painting his nails while he is angry and sad and his appearance is not pleasing. Or he paints without care or care, which leads to a bad appearance, this indicates illness and sadness. When He sees that someone is painting the nails of another person, he already knows him. This indicates that this person will provide a lot of help and assistance to the dreamer and will spend on something he was passionate about. If the viewer is happy or unhappy with this color and if he does not want to see this color, he will stand This person is on the path to achieving his goal. Seeing black nail polish indicates happiness and kindness toward family and friends. Her beautiful appearance indicates goodness that will prevail over him and his family, and if it is evil, then sadness will prevail over him and his family. Seeing the green color indicates travel, traveling, and moving to New places and great benefit will prevail. If he likes the appearance after drawing in a dream, this indicates that his circumstances and circumstances will change for the better. The color of blue nail polish in a dream means satisfaction of desires, calm, comfort and high aspirations, because blue is the color of the sky. His admiration for nail polish shows To him that he will see his desires fulfilled before his eyes, and if he does not like it, he will stop everything he loves and will not get what he wants. Interpretation of a dream about seeing nail polish in a dream for a man. Seeing a man’s nail polish does not bode well, because it conflicts with his nature in reality. Seeing nail polish Nails on the hands mean work and strength, and the feet are the path and payment for everyone who attacks them, and painting parts of the body does not look good. Seeing nail polish that is cracked, faded, or chipped, or that resembles the hooves of a frightening animal; is an indication of illness or affliction, so if one sees that these nails are on one of Its family indicates evil, illness, sadness and misfortune. Seeing large nails in a man’s dream indicates great unhappiness and exhaustion, but happiness will follow after great difficulty. Hard nail polish indicates that the visionary will make many sacrifices and patience to gain understanding to achieve his goals. Seeing a wound What is caused by these claws is
